enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc:
Reduces damage from most sources.
§b+1% Damage Reduction per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de:
Reduces the effects of Vanilla fire damage and burn time.
§b+4% Fire Resist per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d:
Reduces explosion knockback.
§b+2% Elemental Resist per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: §b-3% Projectile Damage Received per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.aqua_affinity.desc:
Increases mining speed while underwater.
§b+4% Cold Resist per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc: §b+4% Damage To Undead per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.desc:
Causes additional fire damage when used to attack a mob.
§b+4% Fire Damage per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.looting.desc:
Mobs will drop more loot when killed.
§b+2% Item Find per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc:
Arrows fired from the bow will set mobs ablaze.
§b+4% Fire Penetration per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de:
Increases the chance of getting good loot while fishing.
§b+4% Double Drop Chance per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping.desc: §b+3% Increased Area of Effect per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Allows the trident to summon lightning bolts during thunderstorms.
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc:
Fires additional basic attaack projectiles.
§b+4% Projectile Skill Cooldown Reduction per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc:
Allows basic attack projectiles to pierce through mobs.
§b+8% Increased Armor Penetration per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc:
Increases movement speed on soul blocks.
§b+4% Magic Shield per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecraft.swift_sneak.desc:
Increases movement speed while sneaking.
§b+4% Dodge Rating per enchant level§r
enchantment.betterarcheology.penetrating: §b+8% Increased Armor Penetration per enchant level§r
enchantment.deeperdarker.sculk_smite.des:
Increases damage to sculk based mobs.
§b+4% Chaos Penetration per enchant level§r
enchantment.stalwart_dungeons.thunder_st:
Gives hammers the ability to summon lightning.
§b+4% Lightning Damage per enchant level§r
enchantment.minecolonies.raider_damage_e: §b+4% Damage To Living per enchant level§r
Amplifies damage when striking a target from behind.
§b+12% Increased Critical Hit per enchant level§r
enchantment.supplementaries.stasis.desc:
Allows basic attack projectiles to ignore gravity.
§b+4% Trap Skill Damage per enchant level§r
